title: Gloucester rabbit pie
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 rabbit, jointed and diced', '110g plain flour', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 carrots, chopped', '800ml beef stock', '200g mushrooms, sliced', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste', '2 potatoes, peeled and finely diced', '1 packet puff pastry']
